formalpara.title: Figure 19. Polarity of P7.p 2° lineage
formalpara.para: Multiple WNT signals from the anchor cell and probably uterus reverse the polarity of the P7.p lineage such that it has an DCBA pattern rather than the default ABCD pattern as does P5.p. A. early L3. B. mid-L3. C. late L3. D. late L3 in animals defective in lin-17 and lin-18 WNT-receptor pathways. Model from Inoue et al. (2004) and Deshpande et al. (2005).
